justification: Relatively small size (loc 48), modest number of methods (nom 6) and fields, very high cohesion (lcom 0.0), and limited dependencies. The class appears focused with a small, cohesive interface, so it does not exhibit signs of inadequate decomposition.

The class accounts for virtually the entire package (224 of 228 LOC) and exhibits signs of being a large, multi-responsibility component: 16 fields, 13 methods, and a relatively high cyclomatic/weight metric (WMC 26). Concentration of most package functionality in one class and wide-ranging dependencies indicate inadequate decomposition and a bloated abstraction that should be split into smaller, more focused classes.

Very small nested helper (4 LOC, 2 fields, no methods) with minimal complexity and no external dependencies. Its narrow scope and size indicate it is appropriately modular and does not suffer from insufficient modularization.
